channel.title: Projects on Christopher Leggett
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Christopher Leggett

item.title: Lenora
item.description: Lenora, in the context of this website, refers to its theme. It is a theme for the Hugo static-site generator, and is currently being used for this very site. It utilizes TailwindCSS and a full-bleed CSS grid layout.

item.title: Space Game
item.description: This is a very simple space shooter game written entirely in JavaScript. The goal of this was not to make a very compelling or ground-breaking game, but to demonstrate what I believe are best practices, based on what I was able to find online.

item.title: Devmarks
item.description: Devmarks is a bookmark manager intended for teams of developers to share bookmarks to documentation, intranet sites, and other valuable information. It is still in development so certain aspects of it are subject to change.
